exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (Z.sub a b)

Premises:
Zeven = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zeven _%Z_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
N.sub = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos n' => match m with | 0%N => n | N.pos m' => match Pos.sub_mask n' m' with | Pos.IsPos p => N.pos p | _ => 0%N end end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.sub (_ _)%N_scope
Zodd = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => False | _ => True end : Z -> Prop Arguments Zodd _%Z_scope
Zodd_sum1 : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (a + b)
Zeven_plus_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a + b)
Zodd_plus_Zeven : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zeven b -> Zodd (a + b)
Zodd_plus_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zeven (a + b)
Zodd_mult_Zodd : forall a b : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd b -> Zodd (a * b)
Zeven_plus_Zeven : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zeven b -> Zeven (a + b)
distinct_parity = fun a b : Z => Zeven a /\ Zodd b \/ Zodd a /\ Zeven b : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments distinct_parity (_ _)%Z_scope
Zeven_mult_Zeven_l : forall a b : Z, Zeven a -> Zeven (a * b)
Zeven_mult_Zeven_r : forall a b : Z, Zeven b -> Zeven (a * b)
Zodd_opp1 : forall a : Z, Zodd (- a) -> Zodd a
Zodd_opp2 : forall a : Z, Zodd a -> Zodd (- a)
Z.add_nocarry_lxor : forall a b : Z, Z.land a b = 0 -> a + b = Z.lxor a b
Z.sub_nocarry_ldiff : forall a b : Z, Z.ldiff b a = 0 -> a - b = Z.ldiff a b
Z.pow_nonzero : forall a b : Z, a <> 0 -> 0 <= b -> a ^ b <> 0
Z.div_mul : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a * b / b = a
Z.land_ldiff : forall a b : Z, Z.land (Z.ldiff a b) b = 0
Z.bits_inj' : forall a b : Z, (forall n : Z, 0 <= n -> Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n) -> a = b
Z.pow_sub_r : forall a b c : Z, a <> 0 -> 0 <= c <= b -> a ^ (b - c) = a ^ b / a ^ c
Z.bits_inj_iff : forall a b : Z, Z.eqf (Z.testbit a) (Z.testbit b) < -> a = b
Z.pow_add_r : forall a b c : Z, 0 <= b -> 0 <= c -> a ^ (b + c) = a ^ b * a ^ c
Z.lxor_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.lxor a b) n = xorb (Z.testbit a n) (Z.testbit b n)
Z.ldiff_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.ldiff a b) n = (Z.testbit a n && negb (Z.testbit b n))%bool
Z.Even = fun a : Z => exists b : Z, a = 2 * b : Z -> Prop Arguments Z.Even _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.modulo = fun a b : Z => let (_, r) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in r : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.modulo (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.div = fun a b : Z => let (q, _) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in q : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.div (_ _)%Z_scope
Zminus_mod_idemp_l : forall a b n : Z, (a mod n - b) mod n = (a - b) mod n
Z.Odd = fun a : Z => exists b : Z, a = 2 * b + 1 : Z -> Prop Arguments Z.Odd _%Z_scope
Zminus_mod : forall a b n : Z, (a - b) mod n = (a mod n - b mod n) mod n
Zeven_odd_bool : forall x : Z, {b : bool | if b then Zeven x else Zodd x}
Zodd_not_Zeven : forall n : Z, Zodd n -> ~ Zeven n

```coq
intros a b Hodd_a Hodd_b.
assert (Zeven ((a - b) + b)) as H.
- apply Zodd_sum1.
  + assumption.
  + assumption.
rewrite Z.add_sub_assoc in H.
rewrite Z.sub_diag in H at 2.
rewrite Z.add_0_r in H.
exact H.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b Hodd_a Hodd_b. assert (Zeven ((a - b) + b)) as H. - apply Zodd_sum1. + auto. + auto. rewrite Z.add_sub_assoc in H. rewrite Z.sub_diag in H at 2. rewrite Z.add_0_r in H. apply H.
